task.title: Remove Typewriter Paper
task.shortdesc: As you use your typewriter, you will need to know how to remove the paper that you have in the bail.

step.cmd: Pull back the paper bail to an open position to release its hold on the paper.
Pull back the paper release lever.
step.info: Note: This is a very important step. While you may be able to pull the paper out without releasing the lever, over time this will damage the paper release mechanism.

step.cmd: Roll the platen knob forward until the existing sheet of paper is fully removed.
